Harada Y ,
Takahashi H ,
Trusheim H , et al. Comparison of suspension MDCK cells, adherent MDCK cells, and LLC‐MK2 cells for selective isolation of influenza viruses to be used as vaccine seeds. Influenza Other Respi Viruses. 2020; 14: 204– 209. 10.1111/irv.12694

fn.p: Yuichi Harada and Norio Yamamoto should be considered joint first authors.
The peer review history for this article is available at https://publons.com/publon/10.1111/irv.12694
